ABC Workout sheet Workout plan for beginners, three days a week.
A Workout Back workout for beginners, focus on back, biceps and shoulder.
Lat pulldown Focus on back, rest 45 to 90 seconds. 6 sets, 10 to 15 reps
Low row Focus on lower back, rest 60 to 75 seconds. 6 sets, 8 to 12 reps
Hammer curl Focus on biceps brachial, rest 30 to 50 seconds. 4 sets, 6 to 8 reps
Seated reverse fly Focus on the back of the shoulders, rest 45 to 60 seconds. 4 sets, 12 to 15 reps
B Workout Push workout for beginners, focus on chest, shoulders and triceps.
Bench press Focus on chest, rest 60 to 90 seconds. 6 sets, 6 to 8 reps
Inclined bench press Focus on upper chest, rest 60 to 90 seconds. 4 sets, 8 to 12 reps
Cable triceps extension Focus on triceps, rest 45 to 60 seconds. 4 sets, 10 to 12 reps
Lateral raise Focus on shoulders, rest 60 to 90 seconds. 3 sets, 15 to 20 reps
C Workout Legs workout for beginners, focus on quadriceps, hamstrings and calves.
Squat Focus on quads and glutes, rest 60 to 90 seconds. 8 sets, 6 to 8 reps
Stiff Focus on hamstrings, rest 60 to 90 seconds. 6 sets, 10 to 12 reps
Leg press Focus on quads, rest 90 to 120 seconds. 4 sets, 12 to 15 reps
Seated calves Focus on calves, rest 45 to 60 seconds. 4 sets, 15 to 20 reps
